posts.description:
There has been a juicy, Grade A, prime USDA, holy sh*tload amount of hate on my page over the past few days 🙈 Honestly, you’d think I tattooed a swastika on my forehead. Let me catch you up to speed: the good news is I’m not a racist or anti-semite. The bad news is I’m much, much worse than that. I openly dared to say that I put cheese on my pizza. I eat the occasional hamburger. That’s right— I am not vegan 😱 Someone told me I must “like the raping of cows,” someone else said I was a disgrace to yoga, and countless people messaged me to tell me what an repulsive person I am. 🔹🔹🔹
Now, I feel it’s also important to note that I’m not aggressively carnivorous. I mean, I like salads. I buy organic non-GMO everything, and the meat we buy is minimal and humanely raised. I’m 100% happy with all the veggie friends we have in the #badyogi community AND I’ve even made changes to my own life based on their conscientious feedback & anecdotes. We all live harmoniously around here because we all actually LIKE each other! It’s awesome. 🔹🔹🔹
So to anyone who chooses to freely berate others for what they put on their plate, let me just tell you: YOU are what’s wrong with the yoga community. YOU are the problem. You are contributing to the exclusivity that scares people away from doing something good for themselves. You give your fellow vegans & activists a bad image. It’s easy to cherry-pick where our self-righteousness gets placed. Sure, you may be vegan, but have you ever shopped at H&M or Walmart? Have you ever in your life had a cup of NON-fair trade, NON-organic coffee or tea? Whose hands made the cell phone you’re using to troll my Instagram? Before you hit “send” on a nasty comment aimed at cutting someone down because their life looks different from yours, take a step back and at least realize the irony. We can all be agents for change, but you might consider putting down the pitchforks if you want to get your message across. Peace!✌️#badyogisunite
Don't worry about what I'm doing. Worry about why you're worried about what I'm doing 😘 #badyogi #pizza #butalsosalad #badyogisunite #allyogisarerealyogis
Feeling inspired to make you something!🤗 Tell me what meditation you need the most in the comments below!👇🙏 #badyogi #badyogisunite #meditation

This goes way beyond what we eat. Where does your self-worth come from? When we attach our self-worth to little adjectives ABOUT ourselves instead of by WHO WE ARE without any adjectives, we can easily fall into patterns of judgment when we meet people who don’t align with our own beliefs. 🔹
I’ll say it again: There is no prerequisite for you to be accepted here. I don’t care if you’re a vegan or a meat-eater. I don’t care if you’re kind of an asshole sometimes (aren’t we all?😜). It’s fine if you smoke (but for your health I’d IMPLORE you to quit 🙏). I don’t care if you hated the Gilmore Girls and I don’t care if you love Trump. I mean, The Frenchman hates FRIENDS but we make it work somehow 😉 🔹
All of that is irrelevant to your worth as a human to me. Here, you are welcome. You are enough exactly as you are. The only “rule” I have is that I need you to understand that this is MY HOUSE. And in my house we don’t disrespect each other. Discord & thoughtful disagreements are OK, but hatefulness & judgment are not. This is a safe haven, a sanctuary from the rest of the world that already expects us to be so many things according to whatever is “perfect” that week. At #badyogi you don’t have to prove to us that you’re worthy of being here. It’s already done. You have a voice worth listening to. We care about what you have to say. You are seen. You are heard. You are enough. \\ end rant

#badyogisunite
I might be a #badyogi but I'm a total closet hippie who thinks it's a good idea to do tree pose outside on #earthday 😂🤦‍♀️🌴 #badyogisunite #secrethippie #hugthetrees

This picture makes me look way cooler than I actually am. In one of my workshops I taught last month, we talked a lot about how we perceive ourselves versus how others perceive us. What do you believe about yourself that no one else would? Is it a good thing or bad thing? 
#badyogi #badyogisunite #foodforthought

Sometimes you just need to fit it in wherever you can! Even 1-minute is better than nothing, so here's a little #officeyoga inspiration for anyone heading into work this morning 💪 Double pigeon in your desk chair goes a LONG way for tight hips and an achy lower back! #badyogi #badyogisunite #yogainspiration

Tell me I'm not the only one who does this: Do you ever see pictures of yourself and think, "holy shit, I'm an adult?!" Like, we are GROWN UPS?! 99% of the stuff in my house and in my fridge is there because I bought it. I make dentist appointments and host Thanksgivings. We have a CPA. I feel like the only adult "things" more adult than those are having a pool and having kids 😆 ...neither of which I'm eager to acquire. And that's the end of my weird little sidetrack about adulting. And I don't think being an adult sucks. Being an adult is freaking awesome. #badyogi #badyogisunite
Why don't I have this? Actually why don't we ALL have this?! Put it on your desk put it in your car tattoo it on your FACE 🙌 #badyogi #badyogisunite #youaredoingafuckinggreatjob
